website_summaries.verdict: This mat is a great choice for smaller areas, and has attached handles, so you can take it anywhere you need it.
pros: Measures 2 feet x 6 feet and 1-5/8 inches thick
cons: Mat is a little narrow, and not expandable

website_summaries.verdict: The best choice for comfort, quality, and value. You get the most for your money with this gym mat.
pros: Built to last by a trusted name in the industry
Comfortable design makes it ideal for all types of exercise
Folds effortlessly and has a handle for easy carrying
cons: At a little over 9 lbs., it's a bit heavy
This is a small concern considering the quality

customer_reviews.title: Good for BJJ and grappling drills
customer_reviews.text: I bought this primarily for BJJ and grappling solo drills. This has enough padding for ground game drills but no enough for takedowns. To have enough space you’ll need to buy a minimum of 4 of these for 1-2 people to drill. It definitely slides between each mat so you’ll need to buy industrial strength Velcro to keep them in place. I bought 4 and that is enough for me and one friend to drill/roll lightly on.
customer_reviews.author: FS

customer_reviews.title: Did I Get a Lemon??
customer_reviews.text: I received this mat on Monday. I used it for an hour at exercise class on Tuesday, used it for a Pilates class on Wednesday, and that's when I noticed the tear by the handle. Already??? I couldn't even get three classes out of it. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Work Outs
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard wood floor that hurt my tailbone whenever I did simple workouts like sit-ups or crunches. With the Everlast Folding Exercise Mat, all the pain is gone. The cushioning is top notch and shows no sign of wear. The only problem I had with this is the box packaging that in came in. (It didn't properly close) Had it been a day with bad weather (rain/snow), this product would probably have been messed up. The product itself is still a 5/5. Packaging? Probably a 2/5.
customer_reviews.author: ALT

customer_reviews.title: 3 years and counting...
customer_reviews.text: I'm really impressed with this mat... I don't know how i forgot to write a review, this is one of the few things I've bought that's lasted 3 years. lol I use it on hardwood floors to do my yoga and remarkably it still feels very cushiony. Gonna order another one because the vinyl on mine isn't as shiny anymore... probably from being scuffed up on the hardwood floors. But considering it doesn't have any real scratches or tears, I really don't have any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Impressive mat
customer_reviews.text: Got wifey this mat for her beach body workouts (go girl). When I opened the box I was impressed with the padding. Perfect for yoga, lying on back weight exercises or to use for hand/wrist padding instead of directly on floor. Probably going to buy 2-3 more of these when they come back in stock for a nice surface area workout. Easy to fold and store. Nice handle too.
customer_reviews.author: BlakeB4

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, but can still be used if you're on a budget.
customer_reviews.text: I got these to practice BJJ at home and friend's houses. I can't recommend them for that, at least if you are a heavy guy. I'm 150lbs and I find them just OK, however heavier friends find them way too soft. The material is also VERY loose, it is not firm at all. If you read the reviews, you will see people calling it very solid, then others years later mentioning the drop in quality. Good thing I got them on a special.
customer_reviews.author: CAH

customer_reviews.title: This mat is a great buy :)
customer_reviews.text: My daughter thoroughly enjoyed her gymnastics mat. It's a smaller version of what she wanted but it's a lot cheaper and better for people that don't have enough space to put up a huge mat. My kids do back handsprings, tucks and every other acrobatics on this mat, they even take it outside and flip. This mat has held up to 8 kids and a dog and has not ripped or flattened in any way.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam G

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Exercise Mat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mat because it is the brand that my Pilates instructor uses in her classes. After three years of use by multiple students five days a week, the mats still look and feel really good. I recently decided to increase my routine by exercising at home as well as at class so I bought an identical mat and I've been completely satisfied with its performance so far. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alabama Customer

customer_reviews.title: holding up well so far
customer_reviews.text: I would say my 6 year old uses this every day for one reason or another. I thought it would be good for practicing gymnastics, but she sits on it to play, makes forts, blocks homework distractions, etc. I have also used it myself when I work out, my knees can't handle some of the hands and knees type of positions and this cushion is thick enough to make them doable. We have had it for 3 months now and there are no signs of wear.
customer_reviews.author: KNoelle

customer_reviews.title: good for exercising
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised by the quality of this exercise mat. It did have a slight chemical smell when I first got it but that has disappeared. It is very comfortable for exercising, or relaxing for short while. It is quite heavy though and I would not recommend it if you're looking for something to carry around if you don't have a car. still using this exercise mat six days a week and it is holding out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mihaya

customer_reviews.title: Firm mattress replacement
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. I bought two and put them next together to make a "firm mattress" to sleep on the floor! I wish they make this into different sizes to fit queen/king bed frame.
customer_reviews.author: John Anders

customer_reviews.title: Thick and Well Made
customer_reviews.text: This mat is thick and perfect for anyone with injuries. It's made well and there is nothing cheap about the workmanship. The mat does NOT smell like chemicals or rubber. I use this on a hardwood floor and don't feel the floor. I do stretching exercises and light/beginning yoga on this mat without pain from the hardwood and would purchase again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: RSB

customer_reviews.title: Most Durable and Comfortable Mat Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mat! We have two mats at home and they were not durable or thick enough. I am a senior citizen with hip and knee pain. This mat allows me to excercise with comfort and looks like it will hold up for years. Plus it is easy to fold and put away.
customer_reviews.author: LuvLobster53

customer_reviews.title: This mat is As advertised
customer_reviews.text: I received received this mat and have been using using for about a week. This is a good mat for doing simple floor exercises. It measures 24" x 72" x ~2" and will likely last for many years. The vinyl covering is very good. I can't see why anyone would be disappointed with this product, specially at this bargain price. Note that it is made by "Everlast", the same company that produces boxing gloves and punching bags. Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: PH M.

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for what I use it for
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for what I use it for. I bought a Walmart one prior and it was falling apart on the first use. The first time I used this one it was great. I have a bad back so I need something that is comfortable. This is soft and works great with my back. Not in any pain when I use this. It is not to thick, but thick enough to feel like you are on some padding instead of the hard floor. I would recommend this product to anyone that needs to use the floor to workout.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Dickens

customer_reviews.title: Great, but be careful of rashes or hives?
customer_reviews.text: We use these in case the kids fall off the trampoline. The problem is whatever they are made of or chemicals or whatnot, my kids somehow got all these rashes and hives from being on it, rolling on it. Maybe they are all allergic, but something sure seems wrong here. Not sure what chemicals they use in it, but whatever it is, we no longer roll on it. I still keep it in case the kids fall off the trampoline, but it's only for emergency and for not a bad price.
customer_reviews.author: thiink

customer_reviews.title: Solid Support, Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Way more dense than the previous mat I had, which was a similar-priced trifold mat from Dick's. This one allows me to do my back-pain correcting yoga exercises without feeling like I'm laying directly on the floor, and I'm 6'3, 240lbs. Very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: fastalker64

customer_reviews.title: Love this mat for exercising!
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific product! I am so very pleased with it. I've lost 51 pounds by adding daily exercise into my routine. This mat was critical to helping in my weight loss. In the evenings at home, I do sit-ups and this mat is perfect for back support. Whatever exercises I'm doing, the mat stays in place and doesn't slide. Most importantly, it's comfortable. A great exercise for at-home exercises. Perfect product! Author Pam Meily
customer_reviews.author: Pamela M. Vetter

customer_reviews.title: I love this! My tailbone is broken
customer_reviews.text: I love this! My tailbone is broken, which makes it hurt to do sit ups as I am rocking back and forth on the point of the tailbone that is broken. I broke this over 15 years ago, the pain is real when doing sit ups. I use to have to sit on a pillow if I wanted to work out! This and the fancy ones at the gyms are the only ones that work and don't feel pain! I love how sturdy but soft this is! Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Karrie

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose, wish it was wider.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to do physical therapy at home since I needed some cushion on my tile floors. It serves its purpose, but I really wish it was wider. (I thought it was wider, but then realized the image I was looking at as reference, was actually two of them) So unfortunately certain exercises feel like I'm going to fall off of the cushion. :(
customer_reviews.author: Taelune

customer_reviews.title: Needs thicker/solid padding
customer_reviews.text: Everything is perfect with this mat from the storability to the durability. Have used it continuously for over a year without any issue. Con: Would be nice if the padding was solid. Kneeling on it for some exercises over time start to Ware it down and you can feel it on your knees.
customer_reviews.author: RyeBri

customer_reviews.title: but I have been very happy with it overall
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mat because I recently began doing the "Gymnastic Bodies" program from Chris Sommer. As other reviewers mentioned, the mat is a little narrow (I'm 6'2", 215 lbs), but I have been very happy with it overall. It makes a world of difference doing the exercises on this mat compared to a hardwood or carpeted floor. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Just the mat for this decrepit boomer!
customer_reviews.text: This is the mat that made me willing to get back on the floor to exercise. Between bursitis in my knees. lower back pain, and an arthritic hip, I both needed to exercise and hurt too much to try it on a bare floor or yoga mat. I can kneel, lie on my back or on my side without any problem from my usually complaining joints, It's thick enough for comfort, easy to wipe down, and very light to handle. A pleasure to use.
customer_reviews.author: Odessa Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Great padded mat
customer_reviews.text: I got this for working out since I am pregnant and a typical yoga mat does not provide the needed and extra support. It arrived well packaged. After cleaning it and using it, I have been enjoying my workouts now. It is well padded and is great for any prenatal workout. I recommend this even if you are not pregnant. Plus I plan to use this with my baby since most puzzle floor mats are not as thick as they should be for children to play on.
customer_reviews.author: Edna M.

customer_reviews.title: Holds up to abuse
customer_reviews.text: I beat the hell out of these mats because I use them as a backstop for petanque practice in the garage. Petanque is played with heavy steel balls. Constantly throwing steel balls against these mats doesn't damage them, so if you are wondering how durable they are, that should provide some info.
customer_reviews.author: Apollinaire

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my toddler (3 yrs)
customer_reviews.text: purchased this as my son is now wanting to do "gymnastics" and it works perfectly for practicing his forward rolls. I have also used this as a nap time mat which was a bonus, and not the intention when purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Rivero

customer_reviews.title: The Everlast mat should be in every exercise regime
customer_reviews.text: The Everlast mat is a great addition to my exercise routine! My knees are one of my problem areas and having the mat to cushion them is great! The mat itself is a great exercise surface...it gives you a padded but flat surface to do any exercise you want or need to do. This is especially important when doing balance exercises. If I fall over doing a move, I land on soft ground!
customer_reviews.author: Gayle L. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great mat for kids at home!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter(s) for Christmas and it has been a big hit. This mat folds up perfectly to store in the corner or under her bed, which is great. It isn't very wide but it is long, which is perfect for the acrobats that she uses it to practice. It is nicely padded but isn't too heavy, and she can carry it from her room upstairs, downstairs to the living room (she is 8). I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great multiuse mat!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I bought these to put on the floor in our therapy area downstairs for my son. It protects him from falls as he does physical therapy. They fold easily for storage, and we even have used them for our kids to sleep on when they make a pallet in different rooms, or we have my neices and nephew over. It definitely met my expectations. We ended up going back and getting three!
customer_reviews.author: Chasity

customer_reviews.title: Wish they were waterproof
customer_reviews.text: We use these in our vet clinic for our acupuncture appointments. They provide the dogs with a soft, warm place to rest, as our floors are hard, cold, slippery tile. They make a huge difference! Wish they were waterproof, though. Had a pet urinate on one, and we can't get the smell out.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha P.

customer_reviews.title: Feels sturdy and just the right amount of cushion
customer_reviews.text: I use this mat for push ups, sit-ups the usual floor exercises 4 times a week. Feels sturdy and just the right amount of cushion, and when folded in "half" you can use the attached handles. This is a good thing---the mat doesn't absorb any moisture so If you are doing a heavy workout you'll want to bring a towel.
customer_reviews.author: Tod Kuntzelman

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, nice design, dimensions as described.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mainly because I have hard pergo flooring and I wanted to do some sit-ups, leg lifts, and neck exercises on the floor. This product is exactly what I needed. I also like the design with the single fold (as opposed to double fold models sold here on Amazon) because it helps keep the inside layers clean when storing it away (the side I'm actually laying down on when I use it). Handles are a nice touch. Some people have said that the padding is a little stiff, but that's what I was looking for. It feels like the old mats I used to train on for martial arts, back in high school.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent workout mat
customer_reviews.text: It's thick, it's not a yoga mat, but if you have tile floors like I do, it's great to do situps and other exercises. Since it's so thick, it may not be as easy to balance as say a yoga mat would, so it's not useful for standing on if you're holding positions. Has been very durable and has held up well for a number of years, even with the puppy occasionally chewing on it. The only problem is the glossy surface seems to be a bit sticky and collects dust from the floors, not really a big deal to me.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Useful for infants/toddlers as protection from wooden floors!
customer_reviews.text: We're using these to lay over our hardwood floors so the baby can play and crawl safely without fear of bumping her head! You know, sometimes babies will "faceplant" as they learn to crawl or even fall as they learn to stand. Our only carpet is limited to smaller rooms, but a few of these unfolded and laid next to each other provide plenty of room for her to play while offering great protection! Best of all they fold up and store under the couch and the handles really help to move them around easily. Cheap and functional (though our purposes didn't include adult exercise!) and actually a bit nostalgic (reminds me of gym class)!
customer_reviews.author: Kaizoku!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mat
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mat. Ordered it for doing sit ups, crunches and other ab work in our home gym. My tail bone was hurting doing sit ups on the rug and this mat solved the problem. Looking forward to taking my workouts to the next level. In fact I liked it so much that I just ordered a second one for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Debra H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Mat at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: When my 3 year old daughter started gymnastics we soon realized that we would need to start working on her tumbling and somersaults at home too. We searched locally and were having a hard time finding what we wanted. Luckily for us Amazon had exactly what we needed. This mat is 2" thick and 6' feet long making it the perfect size to practice gymnastics moves at home. The added bonus of it folding in half for easier storage makes it perfect, since we can easily slide it under our couch when not using it. Highly recommend if you need a home gym mat that actually provide cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Shell Burger

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product for limited space
customer_reviews.text: My daughter began gymnastics one year ago and is now competing. This is a great product for limited space. She can fold it up when not in use and it stores nicely in a hallway or behind a door without taking up too much space. When she does use it, it provides just enough padding for her to practice her kick overs, round offs and bridges.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable
customer_reviews.text: This is a very durable exercise mat. 100+ lb of weights won't permanently compress or deform it. My cats can't damage it. There are hardly any signs of wear after 4 years.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: I love these mats
customer_reviews.text: First, I love these mats. Better than a yoga mat for exercise, especially on hard floors. However, the padding is very variable. I just bought a second mat and it's much softer than my first. Nearly too soft. I don't like it as much as the first. My first mat is 5 stars, this one maybe 4, but overall it gets a 3 star rating for being too variable.
customer_reviews.author: A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best Mat Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Words cannot express how much I love this mat. I have musculoskeletal injuries from a past car accident and need a thicker but supportive, firmer mat to do my stretches on because the usual thinner mats will start the butt burning :-( I spend a couple hours a day "living" on this mat; it's a real lifesaver. I do a long, relaxing stretching routine while listening to an audiobook in the background. I also like how you can fold it in half and carry it with the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great overall
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great mat that provides cushion for your back while doing ab exercises. My back would hurt after working on those super thin mats at the gym. This product allows me to do all of my ab exercises and overall is very comfortable. I even had a friend sleep on it one night. The product folds up nicely and easy to put down. It is not that wide, so I would only really use it for personal exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Too soft, could feel floor when jumping
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to jump on while doing Insanity. I could feel the floor when jumping on it. I sent it back and got a big 2" thick foam mat from We Sell Mats. I think it's listed as a tumbling mat. It was MUCH better, exactly what I was looking for. This might be ok for someone lying down on it, but if you want something this squishy, maybe you should do your exercises on a bed.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Terrific support for abdominal exercises
customer_reviews.text: I find yoga mats to be terrible for doing abdominal exercises at home. There's just not much support. After doing some searching, I came across this awesome mat by Everlast at a very affordable price. It is the perfect size, and since it is thicker, it offers a more cushioned support. I am incredibly glad I purchased this!
customer_reviews.author: mdgrl79

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Great thick mat.Seems to be made well and durable, I do wish the handles we’re thicker material but they work well so far! I bought blue to remind me of the old gymnastic-mat days :) love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Love this mat!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in 2014 and it is still going strong! At first I bought it because the physical therapy I was going required I stand on an uneven surface and do some balance related exercises, but it was also perfect for general floor work and even the park when we would do work in the grass. My kids use it as a barrier in Nerf fights. This mat has been well loved for two years now and still looks great. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cintinative

customer_reviews.title: Great for in-home tumbling practice!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 13 year old all-star cheerleader to practice standing backtucks. I am amazed at the thickness and softness of this mat for the price. Makes a perfect "crash mat" for tumbling practice. Gave her the confidence to do a standing tuck without a fear of hurting her knees. Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this mat. I was using a normal roll up yoga mat over the carpet for Pilates. A couple of the excercises required me to balance all of my weight on my hip to do an oblique crunch. Pain! This mat is thick and dense and makes it possible to do any position that is needed. I think that I could even sleep on this mat.
customer_reviews.author: Oklahoma momma

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Workout Mat!
customer_reviews.text: I was developing some knee and wrist pain when I first started yoga. This thick mat was great to give me some added cushion until I could build up my strength for a traditional yoga mat. Also great for workouts that require a mat e.g. Tracy Anderson's Mat DVD's. Provides excellent support, well made. Definitely would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Hong

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not bad, I don't feel the floor through it doing it while doing crunches but I wish it was a bit more dense like the ones at my gym
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Easy to pack and store away
customer_reviews.text: My daughter practices her flips and handstands on this mat. She loves it. Easy to pack and store away. The other night my daughter had a difficult time sleeping. She came in our room and set up her mat by our bed. She slept on it all night. I was surprised she was comfortable enough to sleep on it, but she was. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Tamara L Velesko

customer_reviews.title: This is a great mat for toddlers/kids to tumble on
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mat for toddlers/kids to tumble on. It's half the price of all the other brands I looked at, and folds up perfectly for the corner or to store in a closet. It's plenty thick for toddle tumbling, and with the handle is easily transported. Also, it's way lighter than I thought it would be. I am very satisfied- the one thing that would be perfect is to get 2 of these, or if they made a version with 3-4 sections, so it's twice as wide. (Maybe there is a larger size?) Anyhow, recommend for play tumbling!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Crocker

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: bought this item twice...great quality and good thick mat, like it because it folds out on floor keeping the side you lay on clean and untouched by floor.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn ritacca

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars except for the price. The product performs well and I have used my previously owned one for laying outside in the sun instead of using an air mattress. I weigh 300 pounds and with this mat I don't bottem out and don't ever have to worry about losing air pressure. My wife and I bought this second mat for our twin 5 year old granddaughters to go beneath their sleeping bags for sleeping or general horseplay. No air pump required and instant setup inside or out. My first purchase is several years old but looks and performs like brand new.
customer_reviews.author: DLK1

customer_reviews.title: Size, quality and convent to carry/store
customer_reviews.text: This Matt was so perfect that I got another for our vacation home. It folded in half and has two carrying hanndles. It unfolds to a perfect size for doing lots of exercises. It is 2" think made with a foam that's senses enough to support your body weight but soft enough to put you to sleep. Very rugged. But the design is the best attribut! You won't be sorry if you get this. It will last forever!
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Everlasting folding floor mat
customer_reviews.text: Great for floor workout, it’s a tri-fold. Easy to carry and store. Made well, And has carry handle. Would order again when worn out—not yet!!
customer_reviews.author: Jay & Bitty

customer_reviews.title: She can only do about 2 cartwheels at a time on it but it is thick and a great quality. Perfect for what I needed it for
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 5 and uses this for practice. She can only do about 2 cartwheels at a time on it but it is thick and a great quality. Perfect for what I needed it for. Cleans easy. I just wipe it with a wet rag. The fact that it folds up is great. It allows me to have it out in my daughters room and just fold it and slide it under her bed when she is done practicing.
customer_reviews.author: Kvd11

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Came on time , but I unfortunately ordered just one may instead of two 😂,also comfortable ,I don’t have a bed currently so I actually sleep on this mat 😂
customer_reviews.author: Gissel

customer_reviews.title: Quality from a name-brand.
customer_reviews.text: I remember using the cheap mats they had in my high school for PE and still feeling a lot of pressure on whatever made contact with those mats.This is absolutely not like that.It has ample cushioning and the material prevents you from slipping around all over the mat.Even when you get really sweaty.I got it new for around 40$.Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great exercise mat for sit-ups
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality exercise mat. I only wish it was longer. I'm 5'9", and I need a little more length. I bought it to protect my back while doing sit ups, crunches, and Pilates. It's thick and offers a nice thick cushioned protection off the floor. It folds compactly to store behind the couch or against the wall. It has no strong odors as other reviews have mentioned about exercise mats.
customer_reviews.author: LyndseysMom

customer_reviews.title: Great product reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kids to use as a tumbling mat. I purchased 4 of them, and I am sewing on Velcro so they can be attached to make a 6x8 mat to cover our hardwood floors. We have indoor swings and climbing equipment for them to use in the wintertime for exercise, and I don't want them hitting their heads on the hard floors. These fit under our couch. They also make a decent sleeping mat if you don't have room for a guest bed. Nicely made, and much cheaper than the tumbling mats made by children's companies.
customer_reviews.author: harmonyszoo

customer_reviews.title: Great mat
customer_reviews.text: I had finally have to replace my last mat, yes I am buying this product again... first time in 6yrs. I workout 5 days a week, (plates mat routine) this mat has held up great to all kinds of abuse. I will keep buying them
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great band for your buck
customer_reviews.text: This mat is fantastic, my 6 year old loves it for practicing her cartwheels, round offs and back bends. The way it folds makes it very easy to store and it's not so heavy that she can not move it herself. Excellent mat for the price!
customer_reviews.author: C. Chadwell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mat!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and feels good to be able to do my abilities routine off the hard ground. The cushion is just what I needed and it's very easy to wipe down after an intense session.
customer_reviews.author: Don Goochy

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I recently got a yoga hammock but the only place I could put it was downstairs in my basement which has cement floors, so I didn't want to go upside down without a mat underneath me. This fits perfectly in the space I have available and now I'm not so worried about breaking my neck. Lightweight, easy to carry with the handle, doesn't smell too much like new plastic. I'm happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Sara McElwain

customer_reviews.title: It's Great for home
customer_reviews.text: I surprised My 11yr old daughter with this & she loves gymnastics I set it up in my basement & I can't keep her from the basement now after she learns something in her gymnastics class she can't wait to come home to practice what she learned. It's Great for home.
customer_reviews.author: Mo'nique

customer_reviews.title: This mat is not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Although the mat is thick and well made but it is too bouncy for what I use to work out. End up returned it.
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Soft Landing
customer_reviews.text: Just thick enough to give good cushioning for floor exercises. Light enough to easily get in and out of the car.
customer_reviews.author: Goffer

customer_reviews.title: It's a mat - now go exercise!
customer_reviews.text: Very good mat. I expected the cover material to be a little tighter on the foam (as tight as it is at my neighborhood gym). But still a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Tull1

customer_reviews.title: Best excersize mat
customer_reviews.text: Tried other mats, and sent them back. Just the right amount of support. Not to hard or to soft.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice mat
customer_reviews.text: I gotta say that I felt like I was rolling the dice on this, because I was not sure if it would be firm enough. It is soft, but also firm, but not as firm as the commercial type blue mats used for things like gymnastics. Really that is OK though since for a exercise and stretching mat it does not need to be that firm, and this mat is a good balance. I think the quality is OK and there was only the faintest of odor up close which is not a minus, just an observation. The size is also good, I doubt many people would need something bigger.
customer_reviews.author: MidnightRunner

customer_reviews.title: this mat is a pretty good solution
customer_reviews.text: If you have a terrifying habit of falling out bed and the constant near death experiences that come with it, this mat is a pretty good solution. Just slide it out from under your bed every night and cheat the reaper of a beautiful corpse.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: The mat is as described. I intend to use it strictly as a workout mat for doing sit ups and stretches. The quality is OK it could be a little bit better but for the price you can’t go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Chief3377

customer_reviews.title: Great Mat!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good mat. It is firm, and feels of quality materials. My kids like tumbling on it, and it so far keeping its shape well with somewhat regular use. The carry handles are a nice touch and very convenient. The logo path is nice. The stitching looks good. My kids even sleep on it sometimes on the floor. To them, its just as good as an air mattress. I am very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Handles make it easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: Decent mat. Folds in half w handle which is a nice feature. Bought for daughter to use to work on her back handspring. Better suited for sit ups, push ups, stretching and exercise w less dramatic movement. Overall good exercise mat.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this mat
customer_reviews.text: Normally I would say, "This is great for the price", but in this case this mat is just great! I bought it to practice gymnastics with my 2 year old, and I have taken it over for my own work out sessions! It is thick and provides the right amount of support and cushion from my hardwood floors. I would prefer this over any yoga/workout mat. The covering is durable, and after a few months of use shows no signs of wear. I would recommend this mat to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: About the folding mat
customer_reviews.text: I like it. the package box need more protection for ripping and tearing it and poking it deep to make a hole to make sure the folding mat doesn't have any holes or something plus I check the folding mat there's not holes and rips or something I'll purchase one more in the future thank you Amazon
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product. Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Just as described. Was a present for my daughter. Superfast shipping. Item is very durable. Used indoors and outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Jennnifer Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Just a mat.
customer_reviews.text: Just a mat. It slides a bit on carpet, I'm guessing they all do. It's really well built. Tough. Perfect size, folds up and out of the way. If you're reading a lot of reviews for mats, you can stop. I read tons of them and this is your winner.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Troy

customer_reviews.title: nice mat
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say about an exercise mat. It does the job--lets me do floor exercises without extra stress on my back. It also seems well-constructed. All in all, I'm pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: emmapeel

customer_reviews.title: Everlast 2X6 Folding MAT
customer_reviews.text: This is a repeat purchase. The mat purchased several years ago was repurposed. This mat was bought to replace the first.
customer_reviews.author: Gozimoto

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: It’s a terrific mat, great to exercise on as well as relax and watch TV. This is the second one I’ve brought,because I like to double them for EXTRA comfort.
customer_reviews.author: EVELYN  L.  BROWN

customer_reviews.title: My second one
customer_reviews.text: The first one is still in great shape. LOVE these. I need the padding when I do floor exercises. They fold up so quickly. And this might sound awful...but I've actually wiped it down and have thrown a sheet over it and it can double as a guest mattress. (I live in a small NYC studio, so...) and my friend actually found it to be very comfortable. LOVE these mats!
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Great for yoga
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mat because I have a thin area rug over my hardwood floor, and I wanted a thicker cushion for doing yoga. I bought one of these to put under my yoga mat, but it didn't give me quite enough area for some of the postures, so I bought another one and put them side-by-side with my yoga mat straddling them. It's not the perfect setup, but I've been using them this way for a year now with no sagging on the edges where they meet. I also really like having two folding mats because it makes them easy to store in my apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny16

customer_reviews.title: I'm 100% satisfied This mat is great for aerobic workouts
customer_reviews.text: I'm 100% satisfied This mat is great for aerobic workouts,yoga,strenghth training ... Perfect size , i like to work out everyday since i have ordered this , very comfortable and has a good quality, exactly what i needed and totally worth the money The only problem was i waited for 10 days untill i received it ... But now i'm a happy customer :)
customer_reviews.author: Shirin

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Same mats they use at the gym.... exactly as described ... easy to keep clean
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Great for exercise and for back pain
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for exercising. For the first time in my life I developed debilitating back spasms that had me sleeping on the floor. After a few days sleeping on the floor I remembered this mat and tried it. It worked great and helped me to sleep during this time. Since that time various family members have used this when their back acts up. It is firm but not too firm. Of course it is also great for exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn E.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality mat
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a knee-mat for doing ab-wheel exercises and it works well (overkill, though). It is well made and the foam has just the right firmness for my needs. I could see using this a sleeping mat in a pinch. One shortfall for some situations is that the mat does not roll up or compress at all so it takes up some space and is not super portable.
customer_reviews.author: Jared in IA

customer_reviews.title: So much cushion!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Not only is this mat great quality it's got handles so you can easily move it with you if you want to take it somewhere. The product came in tact, on time and in perfect condition. Really excited to be able to start my workouts on it. Would recommend to friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: Lylah

customer_reviews.title: Thick, heavyweight, convenient
customer_reviews.text: This mat is well constructed, compared to flimsy roll-up pads. The sewn-on handles and fold make transporting, using and storing easy. The cover (vinyl?) is heavy as well, and cleans easily. One nice thing to note is that I was worried it would be a pet-hair magnet -- you know, one of those things that has a slight static charge that then attracts every bit of pet hair in a 20 foot circumference. Thankfully, it is not. Would I buy again? Definitely. And in fact, I may buy one for my wife!
customer_reviews.author: CBrew

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and not smelly
customer_reviews.text: Selected this mat to keep a household of a 60, 50, and 17 year old humans in good shape. It is remarkably comfortable, presenting an ideal impedance to the body for both stationary and dynamic forces. I wondered if 2' would feel wide enough; certainly at present, my answer is yes. Most remarkable to me though is the fact that it does not smell plasticky or otherwise unpleasant right out of the box - quite neutral even with one's nose planted next to it.
customer_reviews.author: Dilettante

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect, even for my back
customer_reviews.text: I use the mat for just doing regular exercise when I don't go to the gym. It's perfect, even for my back! Plus when you're done working out it's a great place to relax
customer_reviews.author: pinnieapple

customer_reviews.title: The padding in these does get perma-imprinted easily: I was lying on my side on top ...
customer_reviews.text: The padding in these does get perma-imprinted easily: I was lying on my side on top of it for a while. Now it's got my elbow imprint on it that hasn't gone away after a few days, even after my massaging.
customer_reviews.author: non soli cedit

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: My previous mat was ruined by a flooded basement, and this mat was a great replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Feanor

customer_reviews.title: exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews of this and other similar products, and registering the flimsy nature of most, I opted for this and have been very satisfied. The covering doesn't bother me, the padding is fine for my overweight frame, and it is light for transport. I am sure there is a reason it only folds in half, and not thirds (location of fold lines on body?), but it would be easier to transport if it were smaller. I would still highly recommend this pad.
customer_reviews.author: Zipalong

customer_reviews.title: Good All Around Mat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to do both exercising and just have a mat around if I needed to lay on the floor for things like cleaning under shelves and other chores around the house. It has not disappointed me yet. Always folded right there, grab the handle and take it to whereever I need it. At times I just leave it folded and use it as a knee pad so I have double the softness.
customer_reviews.author: GLM in VA

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: I am a plus sized girl, and after 2 months of regular use I have not see any indentations, sagging or warping. The padding is great. Thick enough to do knee push ups or sit on it without feeling anything from the ground. Perfect size for me at 5'7.
customer_reviews.author: Omaha Nightblade

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I started a "workout at home" kick and was doing a lot of floor exercises. With hardwood and tile floors, my yoga mat just wasn't cutting it! This exercise mat is a great length, folds up and stows nicely, is easy to clean/wipe down, and is thick enough that it protects me from the hard floor. And for the price you can't beat it! I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: MalPal

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my granddaughter who is in cheer. The mats just like this one sold through the cheer assc sold for $200. It did not matter to her that it was black. Heavy duty and worth way more. I would recommend this mat to anyone and her parents have told all her cheer friends who see it every day at practice what the price was---they could not believe it. What a great xmas gift this was for her.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice mat, folds in half
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice mat, folds in half, and is quite long. I am about 5'6 and there is a lot of room to spare. It's good quality and provides nice cushion for doing abs or floor exercises.
customer_reviews.author: E.F.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Mat!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mat. I put this on hard, naked concrete in my garage for sit ups several times a week and I'm not sore or stiff from that at all. Mat is durable and thick - can be doubled over well with still plenty of room for a single person to do sit ups if you want twice the padding. Only 1 star off because of packaging - came punctured and had punctured the mat itself also - resolution was easy and fast through amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A. Hernandez

product_meta.title: Everlast 2X6 Folding MAT
product_meta.description: The Everlast® Folding 2x6 exercise mat is a durable, thick mat that incorporates a foldable design for convenient storage and transportation. The non-absorbent shell is easy to clean for continued use, and sewn-on handles make carrying the mat to and from class a breeze.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
